availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James C. Gill (Jefferson County, Kentucky, coroner)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, coroner. North Carolina native. Married to Martha Jane Connell Gill in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, on April 7, 1860. Father of Albert Gill. Student in Louisville in 1860. Coroner in Jefferson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, 2nd Ward, p. 483.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 10, p. 363A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482709, p.5.
